17 namespace {
18  static unsigned int generate_seed () {
19  unsigned int r_int;
20  LOG_DEBUG << "Generating random seed";
21 
22  #if 0
23  std::ifstream rf("/dev/random", std::ios::binary);
24  if(rf.is_open())rf.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&r_int),sizeof(r_int));
25  else r_int = std::time(NULL);
26  #else
27  r_int = std::time(NULL);
28  #endif
29 
30  LOG_DEBUG << "DONE (" << r_int << ")";
31  return r_int;
32  }
33 }

37 template <typename MatrixType>
38 struct rand_psd_t {
43 };
44 
45 template <>
46 struct rand_psd_t<Eigen::Matrix<double,
47  Eigen::Dynamic,
48  Eigen::Dynamic> > {
49  typedef Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic> MatrixType;
50  typedef boost::shared_ptr<MatrixType> MatrixPtrType;
51  typedef boost::mt19937 engine_type;
52  typedef boost::uniform_01<double> uni_real_type;
53  typedef boost::variate_generator<engine_type,
54  uni_real_type> uni_real_prng_type;
55 
56  static MatrixPtrType apply(int64_t n,
57  int seed=-1) {
58 
60  if (0>seed) seed = generate_seed();
61 
69  LOG_DEBUG << "Creating random dense matrix";
70 
71  MatrixPtrType A = MatrixPtrType(new MatrixType(n,n));
72  uni_real_prng_type prng(engine_type(seed), (uni_real_type()));
73  for (int64_t j=0; j<n; ++j) {
74  for (int64_t i=0; i<n; ++i) {
75  A->operator()(i,j) = prng();
76  }
77  }
78 
79  LOG_DEBUG << "DONE ";
80  LOG_DEBUG << "Computing (A'+A)/2 for symmetricity";
81 
82  MatrixPtrType A_trans = MatrixPtrType(new MatrixType(A->transpose()));
83 
85  (*A) += (*A_trans);
86 
87  LOG_DEBUG << "DONE";
88  LOG_DEBUG << "Making diagonally dominant";
89 
91  for (int64_t i=0; i<A->rows(); ++i) A->operator()(i,i) += n;
92  LOG_DEBUG << "DONE";
93 
94  return A;
95  }
96 };
97 
98 template <>
99 struct rand_psd_t<Eigen::SparseMatrix<double> > {
100  typedef Eigen::SparseMatrix<double> SparseMatrixType;
101  typedef boost::shared_ptr<SparseMatrixType> SparseMatrixPtrType;
102  typedef Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic> DenseMatrixType;
103  typedef boost::shared_ptr<DenseMatrixType> DenseMatrixPtrType;
104  typedef boost::uniform_01<double> uni_real_type;
105  typedef boost::mt19937 engine_type;
106  typedef boost::variate_generator<engine_type,
107  uni_real_type> uni_real_prng_type;
108  typedef boost::bernoulli_distribution<double> bernoulli_real_type;
109  typedef boost::variate_generator<engine_type, bernoulli_real_type>
110  bernoulli_real_prng_type;
111 
112  typedef Eigen::Triplet<double> TripletType;
113 
114  static SparseMatrixPtrType apply(int64_t n, int64_t nnz, int seed=-1) {
115 
117  if (0>seed) seed = generate_seed();
118 
133  if (nnz<n) {
135  throw std::runtime_error ("NNZ < N --- this case is not supported");
136  } else if (nnz>(n*n)) {
138  throw std::runtime_error ("NNZ > N^2 --- this is an error");
139  }
140 
141  LOG_DEBUG << "Creating random sparse SPD triplets";
142 
143  const double p = static_cast<double>(nnz-n)/static_cast<double>((n*n)-n);
144  uni_real_prng_type val_prng ((engine_type(seed)), (uni_real_type()));
145  bernoulli_real_prng_type toss_prng ((engine_type(seed)),
146  (bernoulli_real_type(p)));
147  std::vector<TripletType> nnz_entries;
148 
150  int64_t true_nnz = n;
151 
158  for (int64_t j=0; j<n; ++j) {
159  for (int64_t i=j; i<n; ++i) {
160  if (i==j) {
161  nnz_entries.push_back(TripletType(i,j,n+val_prng()));
162  } else if (toss_prng()) {
163  const double val = val_prng();
164  nnz_entries.push_back(TripletType(i,j,val));
165  nnz_entries.push_back(TripletType(j,i,val));
166  true_nnz += 2;
167  } else {
169  }
170  }
171  }
172 
173  LOG_DEBUG << "DONE";
174  LOG_DEBUG << "Creating sparse matrix from triplets and compressing";
175 
177  SparseMatrixPtrType A(new SparseMatrixType(n,n));
178  A->setFromTriplets(nnz_entries.begin(), nnz_entries.end());
179  A->makeCompressed();
180 
181  LOG_DEBUG << "DONE";
182 
183  return A;
184  }
185 };
